sentences.sContent: Often parents will bring their neonate to the ED with concerns about the umbilical cord and it is just a simple granuloma or normal detachment. But is it omphalitis???
sentences.sContent_eng: Often parents will bring their neonate to the ED with concerns about the umbilical cord and it is just a simple granuloma or normal detachment. But is it omphalitis???
sentences.sCn: 家长往往会带新生儿因担忧脐带到ED，它通常只是一个简单的肉芽肿或正常脱落。但它会是脐带炎吗？？？

remMethod.val: neo(新的) + nat(出生) + e → 新生儿

trans.tranOther: a newborn child, esp in the first week of life and up to four weeks old
